metadata.description:
Alice appears to be just a normal girl. Which makes her integration into Heroic High - the school on an island overflowing with super heroes - all the more difficult. 

When Alice is befriended by a mysterious girl called Eve, Alice finds herself stepping over boundaries that she never imagined possible. And with Villain Island only a stone's throw away, boundaries are definitely something that must be respected...

Written by Chris Bunting, who has previously worked for the likes of Marvel UK, and illustrated by Kit Wallis, who has worked for Image Comics, HEROIC HIGH is a full-color one-shot "pilot episode".
metadata.name: Heroic High
